page.title: 18DRAYCOTT WORK AND PLAY
page.content: Draycott village is a mile down the road and has a good number of well patronised shops that fulfil most needs.A good bus service(every 20 minutes) takes residents to the shops and to what is for many their place of work for{Draycott is home for the lace {making and power industries.}There is a working gravel pit as well as light engineering.Close by is a nursery and a Primary school.The secondary school is 20 minutes away.For older people,there is a club where they can play bingo or call in for a cup of tea.Trips are arranged.The nearby Methodists Chapel holds whist drives,has a good neighbours club and hosts a ladies bright hour.Other weekday activities include a Bible study group.The Draycott boxing club acts as a leisure centre.Plans are well advanced to build another.
